issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
IOS classic app, no alloy.

When i active the search function  into a tableview, i am able to see in real time the row filtered by a text i used to serach.

when i tap on one row of the filtered row, the filter is removed and i view all row in tableview.

i aspect the click event on tableview starts but it doesnt.

in Previous SDK ( ex. 9.0.2 ) it worked fine.
fields.summary: SDK 9.2.2 search function in table view doesnt work
fields.environment:
SDK 9.2.2
tableview
search
IOS
classic app

comments.body: Hi, can you share reproducable code so we can try this ourselves?
